text.kjv: Trust in the LORD with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding.
text.web: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don't lean on your own understanding.

text.kjv: In all thy ways acknowledge him, and he shall direct thy paths.
text.web: In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

text.kjv: For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.
text.web: For God so loved the world, that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him should not perish, but have eternal life.

text.kjv: In the beginning God created the heaven and the earth.
text.web: In the beginning, God created the heavens and the earth.

text.kjv: Blessed are the poor in spirit: for theirs is the kingdom of heaven.
text.web: Blessed are the poor in spirit, for theirs is the Kingdom of Heaven.

text.kjv: Blessed are they that mourn: for they shall be comforted.
text.web: Blessed are those who mourn, for they shall be comforted.
